headline: Why Boeing’s new CFO Jay Malave is ‘critical’ to a turnaround
summary: Malave was most recently CFO of Lockheed Martin.

headline: L3Harris Sets Date for Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Release
summary: MELBOURNE, Fla., July 01, 2025--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) will release its second quarter 2025 financial results before the market opens on Thursday, July 24, 2025.

raw.headline: L3Harris Sets Date for Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Release

headline: Wall Street weighs in on Boeing’s new CFO appointment
summary: Investing.com -- Boeing (NYSE:BA) announced on Monday that Jesus “Jay” Malave will take over as chief financial officer (CFO) on August 15. He replaces Brian West, who will transition to an advisory position, the company said.
